title: Cobb County toddler killed in accidental shooting
content:
ACWORTH, GA (CBS46) -
A 2-year-old boy was killed in Acworth Tuesday after he apparently shot himself with his father's handgun.
It happened around 7:30 p.m. inside the family's home on Athena Court in the Marina Trace subdivision off Baker Road.
Acworth police said the father had just picked up his two young children from daycare while their mother was at work.
"Right now, all we know is that the child was left unattended and got a hold of the handgun," said Acworth police officer Youlanda Leverette.
When officers arrived, they found the boy in his parents' bedroom. His father told officers the gun had been in a holster on the bed when the boy apparently found it and pulled the trigger.
Detectives questioned the father. It's unclear whether he will be charged. Police are not identifying the family until they're sure all of the relatives have been notified.
Check back with CBS46.com for updates.
